faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions about our services

questions.question: Are the pesticides used safe?
questions.answer: Yes, we use licensed pesticides that are safe for public health and the environment, following the highest safety standards.

questions.question: How long does the pest control process take?
questions.answer: Duration varies according to pest type and infestation level, usually from 1 to 3 hours for regular homes.

questions.question: Is there a guarantee on the service?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive guarantee on all our services with possibility of free return if the problem recurs.

questions.question: Do you provide emergency service?
questions.answer: Yes, we are available 24 hours for emergency cases throughout Jeddah.
